name: Baldi's Basics - Full Game Early Demo open source

description:
read this for once (copy paste from gamebanana)

Baldi and all characters are property of mystman12. All code, assets, and music are owned by mystman12. We have nothing to do with mystman12, this is a fanmade decompile of the game. This includes ads, ingame-purchases etc. By using this tool or playing any mods created with this tool you agree to to the conditions above.

DO NOTE AND THESE ISSUES ARE SOMETHING I ONLY HAVE TO FIX

in the main menu you can not move the mouse

in the schoolhouse the player is spawned outside of the schoolhouse for some reason

but other than that everything works and if you know how to fix these issues let me know
